duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage high-volume recruiting for the company, effectively sourcing and placing candidates in a timely manner.
Communicate with internal and external stakeholders to understand requirements and provide excellent customer service.
Support specialized roles hiring in addition to high-volume recruiting tasks.
Assess candidates' qualifications, conduct interviews, and make hiring recommendations.
Work in a matrix environment to coordinate and prioritize hiring needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field (Master's preferred)
